commenter_b: Well, Sharon, I'll tell you what. I don't know a lot of women who regretted NOT aborting their baby. I know quite a few women who DID regret aborting their baby. commenter_a: I was assaulted & I chose to keep my baby. For me I only had 2 choices either A. Keep her or B. Put her up for adoption. Killing my baby which is abortion never crossed my mind. Today she is almost 9 months and I thank God for her every day.. She is a blessing to me and God has a plan for us. I can't imagine my life without her. If your Pro-life you believe in LIFE No matter what.. So even in assault/rape or incest a baby should live. It's not the baby's fault what happened. No one knows how a baby was conceived.. God has a plan for ALL unborn babies.
